channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: PHOTO COLLECTION: AP Top Photos of the Day Friday August 9, 2024
item.description: This is a collection of photos chosen by AP photo editors.

item.title: Georgia lawmaker charged with driving under influence after hitting bicycle in bike lane of street
item.description: Georgia state Rep. Devan Seabaugh is accused of driving under the influence. Authorities say he ran into a bicyclist who was riding in the bike lane of an Atlanta street Thursday night.

item.title: Record-breaking wildfires scorch more than 1.4 million acres in Oregon, authorities say
item.description: Wildfires in Oregon have burned more acres of land this year than any since reliable records began in the 1990s.
